Class AdminManagementController

java.lang.Object
at.qe.g1t2.ui.controllers.AdminManagementController
@Component @Scope("session") public class AdminManagementController extends Object
Controller for the admin view to manage users(Delete, edit,...).

      public void setUser(Userx user)
